Welcome

This is the documentation for RoboJackets’ RoboCup Software team. We are a primarily undergraduate robotics team from Georgia Tech who compete in Division B of the RoboCup Small Size League. See the RoboCup SSL website for more details on the competition.

Note

This project is under active development.

This page is hosted for free by ReadTheDocs thanks to ethical ads, which are non-obtrusive and don’t save or track user data. If you have a spare minute, whitelist ReadTheDocs on your adblocker to support their free documentation hosting.
